entry.title: The Degree of Obesity. How to Determine the Degree of Obesity
entry.content:
Obesity is a disease in which the body weight is increased by increasing the content of fatty tissue. Besides the obvious harm to health (people with its presence will develop diabetes, atherosclerosis and other disorders), the disease significantly spoils the appearance, worsening and even disfiguring figure.

Furthermore, the term "obesity" means a pathology, this word is unpleasant, is clearly negative, to some extent condemneth group. Naturally, neither one nor the other owners do not like excess weight, which often prefer to call his lack of completeness, obesity, but not this definition. However, there is a way to dot the "i": some simple calculations help to distinguish the fullness of obesity.

What is BMI and what is it for?

On the body mass index (BMI), we have repeatedly said in other posts, devoted to weight loss. It refers to the ratio of height and weight, which is expressed by a numerical value and gives an indication of normal, insufficient or overweight humans. It calculated it is very simple: the value of the body weight in kilograms divided by the square of height in meters.

More clearly this can be represented as follows:

The normal value of the index in women vary in the region from 19 to 25. The difference between these figures is large enough that allows index capture growth-weight ratios in people of any stature. For this reason and asthenics fragile and strong hypersthenics have at its mass index "fit" into the gap from 19 to 25. If the resulting number is greater than the upper limit, it is clearly talking about excess weight and justification of the mighty physique and broad bone this case untenable.

To make it easier to navigate in the calculations, we give an example. Take the girl with above average growth of 170 cm and weighing 60 kg, and calculate her BMI.

Thus, a person with such parameters do not suffer deficiency and excess weight. Unfortunately, some can only envy like… And now, when we have understood the basics, let’s go further.

There are many ways to define obesity and its powers, of which we give only the most used. However, regardless of what kind of degree is awarded this disorder, obesity must be fought. However, many Americans do not agree with us. In the US, there is even a special thick society; once a certain time, its members come from different cities and states, arrange meetings and meetings to teach "newbies" that being overweight - this is normal, and we must love themselves as they are. We will not challenge the right of others to their own opinion, but remain at its European convictions obesity - it is not the norm, and the disease that it is necessary to get rid of.

Determining the degree of obesity by BMI. Method one

In this case, the degree is determined depending on the body mass index.

  • BMI of 19-25 is the norm;
  • BMI of 25-30 indicates a "pre-obese" - increased body weight, which is necessary to normalize;
  • BMI of 30-35 corresponds to the first degree of obesity;
  • BMI of 35-40 speaks of the second degree;
  • BMI above 40 indicates the presence of third-degree obesity.

Let’s see, would be considered our hypothetical woman slim, if not weighed 60 and 90 kilograms.

The result - the first degree. As you can see, this method is quite liberal, because even at much lower weight, people often consider themselves full and try to get rid of the extra kilos to look like the most aesthetically pleasing.

Determining the degree of obesity. Method two

The second method is to determine overweight relative to the norm in percentage is used much less frequently than the first.

If "preponderance" is not more than 10%, it is not obese and completion. With an excess of 10-29% are diagnosed with "1 degree of obesity", with 30-49% - the second degree, at 50% and more - the third degree.

For example, initially the girl, which in our example "recovered" from 60 to 90 kg, had asthenic constitution, that is, the notorious 60 kg were her ideal weight. Calculate how much it exceeded its weight "limit" when the stout up to 90 kg. The result - our "guinea" came to the last, third-degree obesity! It turns out, the use of different methods give very different results… What does this mean? Only that ideal system for determining the degree of obesity does not exist, and the calculations are made to give only approximate figures.

In fact, it is very difficult to put on the same level with people very different physique, height, shape and features, etc., and provide a single formula for all. At the present time to determine the presence of obesity and its degrees are the first of the designated ways, but objectively can hardly be considered the ideal. Imagine yourself: well, how can not very tall woman weighing 90 kg be considered "little" full?

However, morality is not in it. We will not complain about the errors of the individual formulas, as well as distressed relative imperfection of the health system and the structure of the world as a whole. We draw attention to something else: thinking about the state of the figure, do not indulge in the calculations and determine how many kilograms you can without remorse "eat" that is not officially regarded as a thick. Control yourself: honest look in the mirror will tell you much more than any arithmetic, it will show you your weaknesses will help you plan activities and then when you are prefer to allow a joy to watch the progress. And then you will cease to care about the issue, there you are overweight or not: You will continuously work on ourselves and better understand that the main thing - not the absence of too full hips or too wide waist, which can be just your feature and exercise, a relief, the harmony of the entire body.

entry.title: Baths With Sea Salt for Weight Loss
entry.content:
Sea salt has been used in ancient Greece and was used as a treatment for various diseases: nervous, cardiovascular diseases, diseases of the musculoskeletal system. Today, in the foreground is the use of sea-salt diet and getting rid of cellulite. Is it worth it to consider this remedy so much a reliable partner in the fight against obesity?

It is known that sea salt has a rich mineral structure, which ensures its beneficial properties. Seawater contains almost half of the periodic table, and a similar chemical composition is derived from its salt. Today sea salt is obtained in the same ways that a century ago - by evaporation. The elements contained in sea water in the greatest concentration, remain dry sea salt. These include:

Sodium and potassium - contribute to the removal of the cells of the body of metabolic products.

Bromine - has a calming effect on the nervous system.

In small quantities of sea salt in the presence of gold, silver, palladium, selenium, boron, manganese, zinc, silicon, nickel, and other minerals.

Concentrated saline is slightly irritating epidermis, increasing blood flow in small blood vessels. Because of this, the metabolic processes in the cells of the skin and subcutaneous tissue increase. Thus, salt bath help to improve skin appearance and to some extent reduce the appearance of cellulite. Salt also has anti-inflammatory properties, dries small foci of inflammation, so that the skin after bath salt looks more smooth and even.

Although bath and cosmetic products with sea salt is recommended for weight loss, the very salt of any fat burning properties are not allowed. And "weight loss" after a bath with sea salt does not occur because of the volume reduction of body fat. Just by dissolving the salt in water to create a hot hyperosmotic solution that extends from the body "extra" liquid and reduces swelling.

Soothing or, conversely, a tonic effect bath with sea salt can be obtained by adding to the water an essential oil or a decoction of herbs with the appropriate action.

The implications are clear: such procedures do not allow to lose weight, but they may help a bit to lose weight by providing the body drain effect. They also help in the fight against cosmetic defects of the skin and affect overall health.

Sea salt bath can be purchased in almost any pharmacy or store. It is better to choose a salt without any coloring and flavoring agents, because the contact with them may cause skin irritation or allergic reaction.

The amount of salt required for a bath, generally indicated on the packaging. Typically, the means take 300-500 grams per 200 liters of water. Adding more salt than is recommended, in the hope of a more pronounced effect, you only get increased dryness and flaking of the skin. Keep this in mind and avoid "overdose".

Before taking a bath with sea salt Rinse under the shower. The required quantity of salt is dissolved in a liter of hot water, and then pour the solution into the water bath. You should select water temperature in the bath, it is comfortable for you, but remember that it should not be higher than 38 degrees. More hot water will dry the skin. In the water you can add your favorite essential oil or a decoction of herbs that enhance the action of the bath. Thus, essential oils of citrus fruits (lemon, orange, grapefruit) increase the effect of anti-cellulite treatments.

Immersed in the bath must not more than 10-20 minutes, at this region of the heart must remain above water. After the bath, you need to take a shower and put on a skin moisturizer. Then comes wrapped in a sheet or a bathrobe and sit or lie down quietly for half an hour. Within 1-2 hours before and after the bath should not eat, but you can drink green tea or herbal decoction.

Baths with sea salt are not for everyone, and have a list of contraindications. These include skin, heart and gynecological diseases, varicose veins, increased body temperature, the condition of alcoholic intoxication, pregnancy. If you have doubts about their safety for you personally, before the start of the procedures would be better to consult a doctor.

You can find a variety of opinions about the use of baths with sea salt. Among them there are also totally implausible: that someone has lost 10 kilograms in just a two weeks alone baths. To believe such statements are not worth it.

More than adequate people actually experienced the effects of sea salt, write to relieve fatigue and improve skin after these procedures. Weight is reduced by only a few kilograms in such baths combined with diet and physical activity. The achieved result is possible to keep under the same conditions.

From the available options in the sale of sea salt most people like the salt of the Dead Sea. Indeed, it has a unique chemical composition, wherein the proportion of sodium chloride accounts for only about 20%, and the remaining 80% - other minerals. Their relatively high content, and provides a more pronounced effect of water treatments.

Thus, a bath with sea salt should not be considered as the basis for weight loss, but rather as an aid provider cosmetic and soothing effect. But weight loss is still achieved a healthy diet and exercise, and do not expect that without them you can achieve noticeable results in the achievement of harmony.

entry.content:
Massage - a method that has long been in service with the conventional medicine. It is approved by the Ministry of Health, and is used to treat a huge number of diseases. Of course, as an auxiliary method of therapy. Massage is used in virtually all areas of medicine. He is firmly entrenched in our lives, and probably in the world there is not one person who would never lay on a massage table.

The effectiveness of massage

The effectiveness of massage has long been proved. It can help you improve the condition of the patient, regardless of the disease, which he suffers. However, the inability of the placebo-controlled studies leaves some doubt as to the mechanism of its effects. Which factor plays the most important role: the psychological or physiological? What makes a person feel relieved: relaxation and faith in the healing power of massage or mechanical effect on the soft tissues of the body?

This question remains open for the time being. We are interested in, whether it is possible with the help of abdominal massage to lose at least a few kilograms? Agree, it would be great: no need to starve, no strain, just lie down on the table, belly up, and wait for someone skilled hands make short work of your fat. Is it possible? Let’s deal.

All the effects of the massage can be divided into psychological and physiological. The first is certainly very useful, but are unlikely to have a specific and predictable effect on the weight of your body. Therefore, it makes no sense to consider them, go directly to the physiological. We will not engage in speculation, use a pseudo-data, for example, on energy currents - too. That’s the impact on the human body has a significantly abdominal massage:

Due to dilation of small blood vessels nutrition improves soft tissues, primarily the skin. Does this mean that fat belly will start to leave? No, otherwise all alcoholics with red faces would not wear belly in his hands, and would look more slender birch. Medicines from the group of proofreaders microcirculation, led by pentoxifylline, have themselves become popular drugs for weight loss.

This effect helps to eliminate stagnant lymph and venous blood. Thus, the massage display allows the liquid that has accumulated in the soft tissues. Perhaps it is this feature made people consider massage as a regular method of losing weight. Firstly, with the fluid leaves the body weight, that causes a person to believe that massage helped him to break down fat. Second, visually stomach becomes more flat. This is due to improvement of the skin and removal of liquid. Third, the possible reduction in waist circumference, again, due to the removal of edema.

How to choose a best anti stretch marks creams

Deciphering the composition cream

A few tips on proper use of anti stretch mark cream.

Firstly, the cream should be applied to clean and dry skin. If you take a shower or bath, before it should be carefully wipe. In general, the adoption of water treatments (eg, contrast shower) before applying the best anti stretch mark creams after giving birth, if not necessary, it is desirable.

Typically, the cream is applied twice a day - morning and evening. The second time the application is best to plan before you go to bed.

Third, just before rubbing, the skin is better "warm" light massage. This promotes better wicking agent components and increases their efficacy.

The cream is applied in a circular massage until completely absorbed.
